author: onattien
content: The TromboneGram Pacer Test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20 meter Trombone test will begin in 30 seconds. Line up at the start. The trombone speed starts slowly, but gets faster each minute after you hear this signal. [beep] A single lap should be completed each time you hear this sound. [ding] Remember to toot in a straight line, and toot as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. The test will begin on the word start. On your mark, get ready, start.

content: You can illegally collect rain water by storing your trombone outside.

author: mahdude
content: The trombone was originally going to be the start of a trilogy, being succeeded by trombtwo and trombthree, but it was so glorious that the next two were cancelled, as they could not live up to the trombone's reputation.

author: NyxTheShield
content: The biggest earthquake in the history of mankind happened in 1960 in Valdivia, Chile, after the local orchestra accidentally performed a rehearsal with 4 tromboners in the brass section.
The trombone is not related to the saxophone in any way (not since the incident).

author: Bobbie
content: There are 206 troms in the human body.

author: Dan
content: Many people believe pee is stored in the balls, but that is just a misconception. It is actually stored in the trombone.

author: SighKick
content: The subtitle of the fifth The Legend of Zelda game was originally planned to be Trombone of Time, however the developers had trouble implementing such raw power into a normal Nintendo 64 cartridge.

author: SighKick
content: Trombone Champ is the first videogame to sell one trombillion copies.

author: SighKick
content: After mastering the trombone, many tromboners proceed to master the trombtwo.

author: NyxTheShield
content: Contrary to popular belief, Trombones are actually made out of bones.

author: April
content: Trombones must be cleaned after every thirty minutes of use. As a result, professional tromboners sometimes carry up to ten trombones with them at a time.

author: Antipocalypse
content: The hip bone's connected to the back bone, the back bone's connected to the arm bone, the arm bone's connected to the hand bone, the hand bone's connected to the trombone.

author: Morgan
content: The trombone is the powerhouse of the brass section.

author: illdie
content: All trombones made after the year 2000 are wi-fi compatible.

author: illdie
content: Inside of every trombone is another, smaller trombone.

author: illdie
content: As long as you continue pulling on a trombone slide, it will extend indefinitely.

author: illdie
content: A trombone's terminal velocity is three times the speed of light.

author: illdie
content: Every trombone has a chilling prophecy of the end times engraved on the inside where noone can see.

author: Doinkington
content: Baboons can play the trombone better than you, they just choose not to.

author: DPS2004
content: If you hold a trombone up to your ear, you can hear the sea.

author: Aradigm
content: 9 out of 10 doctors recommend playing the trombone.

author: DPS2004
content: Trombones can smell fear.

author: Typhoon
content: Playing a trombone is believed to absolve one of sin.

author: Aradigm
content: For every minute you play a trombone, a minute passes.

author: albert salami
content: A master tromboner can eat a hot dog simply by inhaling while someone throws it into their trombone.

author: megaminerzero
content: The tuning slide in a trombone is useless and only serves to make your trombone sound lame.

author: Aradigm
content: A trombonist is someone who discriminates against trombones.

author: unosonu
content: It is illegal to photocopy or digitally reproduce a trombone. Doing so is punishable by death in all US states.

author: megaminerzero
content: Baby trombones are called bonelets.

author: Bobbie
content: It is illegal to own a trombone in the state of Kentucky.

author: Plushel
content: You should never touch a baby trombone. Its parent will smell your scent and abandon it.

author: TheGlitched64
content: If you stretched out 2 trombones end to end, you'd have 2 broken trombones.

author: Aradigm
content: A trombone can survive under water for up to 30 minutes.

author: Plushel
content: You should wait one hour after eating before playing the trombone.

author: Slappy
content: Actually, it's only a Tombone if it's made in Tombone, Italy.

author: Typhoon
content: For a few days in 1986, trombones were feared to be extinct.

author: Henry Zhou's Textbook
content: If you straightened out the tubing of a typical trombone, it would be around 380 centimeters long. That's as long as three football fields!

author: TheGlitched64
content: "Glizzy Gladiators" is a sport where 2 competitors shoot hot dogs out of trombones at each other.

author: Typhoon
content: Some physicists believe the universe is shaped like a trombone.

author: megaminerzero
content: Playing trumpet is a sign of severe hot dog deficiency.

author: megaminerzero
content: Trombone slides longer than 5 meters are outlawed due to being considered lethal weapons.

author: Bobbie
content: There are twelve trombones outside your house right now.

author: 🅱eric
content: The world's largest trombone is in Des Moines, Iowa. It can be seen from space, if you squint a bit.

author: Henry Zhou's Textbook
content: The inventor of the Trombone, Thomas Bonefield, could already make a perfect trombone noise with his mouth alone. He just wanted to share his gift with the world.

author: TheGlitched64
content: In 1989 a 6 string trombone was invented. The only prototype is sealed away underneath the Musikverein

author: megaminerzero
content: At least 153 people have died attempting to put keys onto a trombone.

author: TheGlitched64
content: The Trombone was used as currency in Constantinople in 1422, before people realised their power could topple other forms of trade and currency.

author: Henry Zhou's Textbook
content: The word "Trombone" comes from the latin words "Trombus", meaning "Bell", and "Bon", meaning "comically long musical instrument".

author: Henry Zhou's Textbook
content: The Japanese word for trombone is 「トロンボーン」, which roughly translates to "trombone".

author: TheGlitched64
content: The World Record for shooting a hotdog out of a Trombone is 1.2 miles set by "Iron Lungs" Johnny Babbon in 1953.
